name: Record ID
desc: Foreign key to compound_records table. Links to the drug record to which this indication applies

name: Max Phase For Indication
desc: The maximum phase of development that the drug is known to have reached for this particular indication

name: MeSH ID
desc: Medical Subject Headings (MeSH) disease identifier corresponding to the indication

name: MeSH Heading
desc: Medical Subject Heading term for the MeSH disease ID

name: EFO ID
desc: Experimental Factor Ontology (EFO) disease identifier corresponding to the indication

name: EFO Term
desc: Experimental Factor Ontology term for the EFO ID
